title: When Teemo blinds you right before you last hit the cannon minion

replies.body: Fair enough. He really is a little shit
Careful, he could be hiding right next to you at the moment. Quickly swing your arms around to see if you can hit him before he takes you!
Did it. Didn't find Teemo but my monitor is busted and there is coffee everywhere. A small price to pay to make sure Teemo isn't near though

Teemo: _**[blinds]**_

Me:
#"WHAT DO YOU WANT NOW, YOU CREEPY RAT???"

# Long ago, in a distant land, I, Teemo, the swift scout Master of Darkness, unleashed an unspeakable evil! But a foolish samurai warrior wielding a magic sword stepped forth to oppose me. Before the final blow was struck, I tore open a bag of shrooms and flung him back to his base, where my evil is law! Now, the fool seeks to return to the lane, and undo the future that is Teemo...

## hehehe

GOTTA GET BACK
BACK TO THE PAST
SAMURAI YAS

WATCH OUT!

GOTTA GET BACK
BACK TO THE PAST
SAMURAI YAS-YAS
YAS-YAS-YAS-YAS

GOTTA GET BACK
BACK TO THE PAST
SAMURAI YAS
WATCH OUT!

YAS-YAS
YAS-YAS-YAS-YAS

WATCH OUT!

GOTTA GET BACK
YAS-YAS-YAS-YAS
SAMURAI YAS
YAS-YAS-YAS-YAS

#WATCH OUT!

Before the final blow was struck, I tore open a bag of shrooms and flung him back to his base, where my evil is law! Now, the fool seeks to return to the lane, and undo the future that is Teemo...

> ## hehehe

NOW YOU SHALL HONOR I TEEMO DA MASTAH OF MASTAHS DA SHOGUN OF SORROWS AND MAKE A MONUMENT THAT RISES FROM THE DEPTHS OF IRON TO CHALLENGER.

this is so perfect!

hmmm, a certain samurai...

Teemo's evil is law, that is why the samurai's ban-rate is so high!
Someone call the samurai, we have a unspeakable evil on the loose!

He can windwall the blind thus ensuring a secured cannon, consequences be damned and the day is saved!

As expected of the Samurai.

pls

real champions waste their mana supply on minion kills

autoing minions is for n00bs

When you 1 v 1 Teemo and you both have 50HP but you need one more Auto and he blinds you
https://tenor.com/view/kermit-suicide-hair-flip-gif-5140737[/img]
if I remember right, Aku actually means Evil , but not sure
